name: Unmã #01
description:
Unmã | #01 | Chapter 1: Answer the Call | Watercolor 300g on cotton paper | 2021 | Size 2224x1015 px

“Answer the call. Waking up inside a dream and not remembering the beginning.”

Unmã is a self-fiction comic book. Experimental comic about creating worlds and imaginaries, about queer existences, dreams and spirituality. A silent comic made in watercolor. Fragments of the best paintings from history.

This comic is also the work of conclusion of a graduation course in visual arts at Unesp - Arts Institute (São Paulo - Brazil).
